text:
e="preserve">Ryan Andrew Prescott (born 21 January 1989) is an English actor. He is best known his the role as Ryan Connor on the long-running ITV soap opera, "Coronation Street". He began starring in the role in 2018. In 2011, Prescott played the role of Flynn Buchanan in ITV's fellow soap opera, "Emmerdale" in 2011.
Prescott was born in Southport, England.
